title: Riot not working well with Windows 10?
body:
I'm continually disconnecting in games (though I normally play at 50 ping). This has only happened since this patch, and it affects my computer's internet, as well.

Odd facts that lead me to believe the issues is a riot-w10 issues:

Other computer in same game was perfect.

Computer upstairs had no impact on internet.

My computer internet is perfect when my client isn't in game.

I have the only Windows 10 in the house.

Am I the only one dealing with this? The game is unplayable at the moment

replies.body:
How do you know your internet is perfect?

Are you playing on NA?
If so you need to run pathping 104.160.131.3 (from the command prompt and post the results)

I've seen a few players comment about issues with the recent Windows 10 update, but honestly we haven't seen anything concrete just yet.  Just in case, I still recommend running through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Even though your ping is good and net is fine elsewhere, this specific pc network might be getting blocked or running into snags.  Give it a go and let me know if it helps.
